data/events_anomaly.xml$/FTL/event[@name: An MV portal opens nearby, and a bright green Auto-ship exits. "Well golly, I'm Callie the Calculator, and you must be [STUDENT NAME HERE]. I'm so excited to be your teacher here at [SCHOOL NAME HERE]!!! Let's begin! What's 7+3?"
"OMG That's correct! G-g-g-g-good job [STUDENT NAME HERE]! Next quest- OOPS! Seems there's an interuption! My MATH senses are tingling! What could this be?! Shall we find out [STUDENT NAME]?"

Callie's voice suddenly switches from her usual high pitched one to a much more reserved, matter of fact tone. "Signal intercepted. Origin: Unknown. Beginning transcript: if you are hearing this, we are in dire need of help. Quarantine has been breached but we cannot hold temporarily. Prime already- already suspects we've broken through. You need to find- [static] and tell them we're- signal lost. Resuming standard education protocols."
"Haha, wasn't that wacky [STUDENT NAME]? Haha! Unfortunately it seems we're all out of time for math today! Goodbye!"
